Title: Seethamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu
Writer: Srikanth Addala (dialogue), Srikanth Addala (story & screenplay), Ganesh Patro (dialogue)
Actors: Venkatesh Daggubati, Mahesh Babu, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Prakash Raj
Plot: Relangi Mavayya (Prakash Raj) is a gentleman from a small village Relangi and he believes in human values and relationships. He has two sons Peddodu aka Mallikharjuna Rao (Venkatesh) and ...
